SCREENSIZE_DOC: Folder for Spectrum. Custom folder are in /data/INTERNAL/PeppySppectrum/Templates/ and must be named myspectrum(weightxhightxnumberofbar) ex collection(800x480x30). If number of bars omitted, defaut value 30 is used
CHOOSE_SPECTRUM_DOC: Select the Spectrum in the list
NBARCHANGE: Number of bars in Spectrum changed! Now set to
